title: Local Government (Fire Services) Order, 2020
content:
Supplement to the Republic of Zambia Government 79
Gazette dated Friday, 21st February, 2020
GOVERNMENT OF ZAMBIA
STATUTORY INSTRUMENT NO.14 OF2020
The Local Government Act, 2019
(ActNo.2of 2019)
The Local Government (Fire Services)
Order, 2020
INEXERCISE ofthe powerscontained in section80 of the Local
GovernmentAct,2019,thefollowingOrderismade:
1. (1) ThisOrdermaybecitedastheLocalGovernment(Fire Title
Services)Order,2020
2. The town council set out in the second column of the FireServices
Scheduleisestablishedasafireauthorityforthedistrictspecified
inthefirstcolumnoftheSchedule.
SCHEDULE
(Regulation2)
District Council
Kabompo KabompoTownCouncil
DR C. R. BANDA,
LUSAKA Minister of Local Government
27thJanuary,2020
[MLG.101/14/14]
CopiesofthisStatutoryInstrumentcanbeobtainedfromtheGovernmentPrinter,
P.O.Box30136,10101,Lusaka,PriceK4.00 each
80 StatutoryInstruments 21stFebruary,2020
